content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  April 11 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a Long-term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) of 'BBB+' and a Short-term IDR of 'F2' to Umpqua Holdings Corporation (UMPQ). The Rating Outlook is Stable. A full list of rating actions follows at the end of this rating action commentary.
